title: How do I load the OCR-B font family by name?
body: I've used variants of `SKTypeface.FromFamilyName("OCRB", SKFontStyleWeight.Normal, SKFontStyleWidth.Normal, SKFontStyleSlant.Upright);` such as `OCR B` and `OCR-B` and I always get back `Segoe UI`. How do I load the correct font by name?

comments.author: mattleibow
comments.body: Is the font installed into the OS? Also, what platform is this? Finally, the best way to check things is to load the font by filename and then see what it is called using the `FamilyName` property.

comments.author: Drise13
comments.body:
Font is installed on the Windows 10 OS.

Edit: After doing some more digging it looks like the actual font file is not part of the system but built into MS Word. I think that's where the confusion is coming from.
